person.persName: W. E. Hill (Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer and sheriff)

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer and sheriff. Kentucky native. Son of Lucy Hill. Farmer in Johnson County in 1860. Sheriff of Johnson County in 1862 and 1864 to 1865.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, p. 92; "An Act for the Benefit of W. E. Hill, Sheriff of Johnson County," Acts of the General Assembly of the Commonwealth of Kentucky, vol. 2 (Frankfort, Ky.: George D. Prentice, State Printer, 1865), p. 35; "An Act for the Benefit of W. E. Hill, Sheriff of Johnson County, and his Securities" Acts of the General Assembly of the Commonwealth of Kentucky, vol. 2 (Frankfort, Ky.: George D. Prentice, State Printer, 1864), p. 450.
